meanings.definition: The act of recording a movie or event using a camcorder.
meanings.sent1: Camcording at the concert allowed me to relive the experience.
meanings.sent2: He was caught camcording the new movie at the cinema.
meanings.sent3: The camcording of the school play turned out to be a hit on social media.
meanings.sent4: Her camcording of nature's beauty was like capturing a fleeting moment in time.
meanings.sent5: The art of camcording requires patience and a steady hand.

meanings.definition: A person who engages in the act of camcording.
meanings.sent1: The camcording was done by a dedicated enthusiast.
meanings.sent2: The camcording was discovered to be the work of a film pirate.
meanings.sent3: The camcording was so sneaky, it seemed like a spy mission.
meanings.sent4: The camcording was like a secret agent capturing classified information.
meanings.sent5: The camcording was as discreet as a ninja in the shadows.

meanings.sent1: The camcording was made possible by the latest technology.
meanings.sent2: The camcording was crystal clear thanks to the high-quality camcorder.
meanings.sent3: The camcording equipment was like a magic wand for capturing memories.
meanings.sent4: The camcording gear transformed ordinary moments into cinematic masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The camcording device was a window to the world's wonders.
